option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#F5F5F5" tools:context=".MainActivity">
<!-- Background Gradient Top --> <View android:id="@+id/topBackground" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="300dp" android:background="#0043FF" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Logo Image with Circle Background --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/logoCard" android:layout_width="180dp" android:layout_height="180dp" android:layout_marginTop="60dp" app:cardCornerRadius="90dp" app:cardElevation="8dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imageView" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:contentDescription="Logo" android:padding="20dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" app:srcCompat="@drawable/logokhoa" /> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Login Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/loginCard" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="24dp" android:layout_marginTop="32dp" android:layout_marginEnd="24dp" app:cardCornerRadius="20dp" app:cardElevation="8dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/logoCard">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="32dp">
<!-- Welcome Text --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:text="Welcome Back!" android:textColor="#0043FF" android:textSize="26sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" android:text="Đăng nhập để tiếp tục" android:textColor="#666666" android:textSize="14sp" />
<!-- Username Label --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:text=" Tên đăng nhập" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<!-- Username Input with Border --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxStrokeColor="#0043FF" app:hintEnabled="false">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/username" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:background="@drawable/rounded_image" android:hint="Nhập tên của bạn" android:inputType="text" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:textColor="#000000" android:textSize="16sp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Password Label --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:text=" Mật khẩu" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<!-- Password Input with Border --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxStrokeColor="#0043FF" app:hintEnabled="false" app:passwordToggleEnabled="true">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/password" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:background="@drawable/rounded_image" android:hint="Nhập mật khẩu" android:inputType="textPassword" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:textColor="#000000" android:textSize="16sp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnLogin" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="60dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:backgroundTint="#0043FF" android:elevation="4dp" android:text=" Đăng Nhập" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:cornerRadius="12dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="Quên mật khẩu?" android:textColor="#0043FF" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" android:text="© 2025 Võ Nguyễn Đại Hiếu" android:textColor="#999999" android:textSize="12sp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main_2217" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#F5F5F5" tools:context=".MainActivity">
<!-- Background Gradient Top --> <View android:id="@+id/topBackground_2217" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="300dp" android:background="#0043FF" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Logo Image with Circle Background --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/logoCard_2217" android:layout_width="180dp" android:layout_height="180dp" android:layout_marginTop="60dp" app:cardCornerRadius="90dp" app:cardElevation="8dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/imageView_2217" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:contentDescription="Logo" android:padding="20dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" app:srcCompat="@drawable/logokhoa" /> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Login Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/loginCard_2217" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="24dp" android:layout_marginTop="32dp" android:layout_marginEnd="24dp" app:cardCornerRadius="20dp" app:cardElevation="8dp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/logoCard_2217">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="32dp">
<!-- Welcome Text --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:text="Welcome Back!" android:textColor="#0043FF" android:textSize="26sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" android:text="Đăng nhập để tiếp tục" android:textColor="#666666" android:textSize="14sp" />
<!-- Username Label --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:text=" Tên đăng nhập" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<!-- Username Input with Border --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="20dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxStrokeColor="#0043FF" app:hintEnabled="false">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/username_2217" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:background="@drawable/rounded_image" android:hint="Nhập tên của bạn" android:inputType="text" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:textColor="#000000" android:textSize="16sp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Password Label --> <TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:text=" Mật khẩu" android:textColor="#333333" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<!-- Password Input with Border --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusBottomStart="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopEnd="12dp" app:boxCornerRadiusTopStart="12dp" app:boxStrokeColor="#0043FF" app:hintEnabled="false" app:passwordToggleEnabled="true">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/password_2217" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:background="@drawable/rounded_image" android:hint="Nhập mật khẩu" android:inputType="textPassword" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:textColor="#000000" android:textSize="16sp" /> </com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnLogin_2217" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="60dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:backgroundTint="#0043FF" android:elevation="4dp" android:text=" Đăng Nhập" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:cornerRadius="12dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="Quên mật khẩu?" android:textColor="#0043FF" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" android:text="© 2025 Võ Nguyễn Đại Hiếu" android:textColor="#999999" android:textSize="12sp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" tools:context=".ProfileActivity">
<!-- Header Background --> <View android:id="@+id/view" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="280dp" android:background="#0043FF" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Title Profile --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtName6" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="Profile" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Back Button --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtName7" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="< Back" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="16sp" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Settings Button --> <ImageButton android:id="@+id/btnSetting" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:background="@null" android:contentDescription="Settings" android:scaleType="fitCenter" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:srcCompat="@drawable/img" />
<!-- Profile Image --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/imageView2" android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:layout_marginTop="70dp" android:layout_marginStart="24dp" android:background="@drawable/rounded_image" android:clipToOutline="true" android:contentDescription="Profile Picture" android:scaleType="centerCrop" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:srcCompat="@drawable/logo" />
<!-- User Name --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtName" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:text="Võ Nguyễn Đại Hiếu" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/imageView2" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/imageView2" />
<!-- Username Display --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtUsername" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="@username" android:textColor="#E0E0E0" android:textSize="14sp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="@+id/txtName" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/txtName" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/txtName" />
<!-- Friends Count Label --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtName2" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="40dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:text="Friends" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="14sp" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/imageView2" />
<!-- Friends Count --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtName4" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="100000" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/txtName2" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/txtName2" />
<!-- Follows Count Label --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtName3" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Follows" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="14sp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/txtName2" />
<!-- Follows Count --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtName5" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="5000000" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/txtName3" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/txtName4" />
<!-- Posts Count Label --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtPostsLabel" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="40dp" android:text="Posts" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="14sp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/txtName2" />
<!-- Posts Count --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtPostsCount" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="250" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/txtPostsLabel" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/txtName4" />
<!-- Detail Information Card --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutDetailInfo" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="24dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:layout_marginEnd="24dp" android:background="@drawable/card_background" android:elevation="4dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/view">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Email" android:textColor="#666666" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtEmail" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:text="vndaihieu@example.com" android:textColor="#000000" android:textSize="16sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Phone" android:textColor="#666666" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtPhone" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:text="0123-456-789" android:textColor="#000000" android:textSize="16sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Address" android:textColor="#666666" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtAddress" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:text="Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam" android:textColor="#000000" android:textSize="16sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Birthday" android:textColor="#666666" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtBirthday" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="01/01/2000" android:textColor="#000000" android:textSize="16sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<Button android:id="@+id/btnShowInfo" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="24dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:layout_marginEnd="24dp" android:backgroundTint="#0043FF" android:text="Xem All Thông Tin" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="16sp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/view" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/main_2217" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" tools:context=".ProfileActivity">
<!-- Header Background --> <View android:id="@+id/view_2217" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="280dp" android:background="#0043FF" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Title Profile --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtName6_2217" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="Profile" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Back Button --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtName7_2217" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:text="< Back" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="16sp" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<!-- Settings Button --> <ImageButton android:id="@+id/btnSetting_2217" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:background="@null" android:contentDescription="Settings" android:scaleType="fitCenter" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:srcCompat="@drawable/img" />
<!-- Profile Image --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/imageView2_2217" android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:layout_marginTop="70dp" android:layout_marginStart="24dp" android:background="@drawable/rounded_image" android:clipToOutline="true" android:contentDescription="Profile Picture" android:scaleType="centerCrop" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:srcCompat="@drawable/logo" />
<!-- User Name --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtName_2217" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:text="Võ Nguyễn Đại Hiếu" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/imageView2_2217" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/imageView2_2217" />
<!-- Username Display --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtUsername_2217" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="@username" android:textColor="#E0E0E0" android:textSize="14sp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="@+id/txtName_2217" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/txtName_2217" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/txtName_2217" />
<!-- Friends Count Label --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtName2_2217" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="40dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:text="Friends" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="14sp" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/imageView2_2217" />
<!-- Friends Count --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtName4_2217" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:text="100000" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/txtName2_2217" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/txtName2_2217" />
<!-- Follows Count Label --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtName3_2217" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Follows" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="14sp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/txtName2_2217" />
<!-- Follows Count --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtName5_2217" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="5000000" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/txtName3_2217" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/txtName4_2217" />
<!-- Posts Count Label --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtPostsLabel_2217" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="40dp" android:text="Posts" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="14sp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/txtName2_2217" />
<!-- Posts Count --> <TextView android:id="@+id/txtPostsCount_2217" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="250" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/txtPostsLabel_2217" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/txtName4_2217" />
<!-- Detail Information Card --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/layoutDetailInfo_2217" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="24dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:layout_marginEnd="24dp" android:background="@drawable/card_background" android:elevation="4dp" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/view_2217">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Email" android:textColor="#666666" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtEmail_2217" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:text="vndaihieu@example.com" android:textColor="#000000" android:textSize="16sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Phone" android:textColor="#666666" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtPhone_2217" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:text="0123-456-789" android:textColor="#000000" android:textSize="16sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Address" android:textColor="#666666" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/txtAddress_2217" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" android:text="Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam" android:textColor="#000000" android:textSize="16sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Birthday" android:textColor="#666666" android:textSize="14sp" />

<Button android:id="@+id/btnShowInfo_2217" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="24dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:layout_marginEnd="24dp" android:backgroundTint="#0043FF" android:text="Xem All Thông Tin" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textSize="16sp" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/view_2217" />
